turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I like to order a pizza from Bella Luna's, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two small pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both of them thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have one pizza be Hawaiian Pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And another be a meat lovers pizza with extra bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 2 small pizzas with thin crust, one hawaiin, one meat lovers with extra bacon, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's about it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $26, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is perfect. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Delivery, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be delivered within 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. That sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizza.
